sentences:
Eivind Bolle ( 13 October 1923 – 10 June 2012 ) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party .
He was born in Hol .
He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Nordland in 1973 , and was re - elected on two occasions .
He had previously served as a deputy representative during the term 1969 – 1973 .
He was the Minister of Fisheries from 1973 to 1981 during three different cabinets : second cabinet Bratteli , cabinet Nordli and first cabinet Brundtland .
During these three periods he was replaced in the Parliament by Eindride Sommerseth , Karl Ingebrigtsen and Finn Knutsen respectively .
On the local level he was a member of Hol municipality council from 1959 to 1963 , and later in Hol 's successor municipality Vestvågøy .
He served as mayor from 1971 to 1973 , during which term he was also a member of Nordland county council .
Outside politics he worked as a fisher from 1938 to 1974 .
